TopicTitle: x64 1.1.2- Ship falls apart on launch pad- modlist inside

Articles.Content:
Hi all, 

Everytime I launch from the VAB, the ship starts out on the pad attached to the clamps, but after it does the little initialize thing, the ship falls apart, and I lose interstage fairings/engines attached to the procedural thrust plate. This is a relatively new occurence.  Didn't happen playing with RO, but now that I'm playing without it, it seems to happen often. 

Mod List-

Aerojet Kerbodyne (AerojetKerbodyne 3.0.6C)
Animated Decouplers (AnimatedDecouplers-x86 v1.3.1)
AntennaRange (AntennaRange 1.11.3)

Weird.  Can you share the .craft file for one of the ships you're having trouble with, so we can try to recreate the problem?
